data.message: I can't say enough about the people I have met. . . they have given me encouragement, they have taught me, they have shared things with me that allowed me the freedom to share some of the "Sick Secrets" I carry, I can say I have PTSD and my main method of coping is isolating. . facebook opened a door. . . thank you all

replies.message: Thank you so much for the kind words, Marilyn! We're glad we could help you get to where you are now. -Sarah

" THANK YOU FOR THE CONNECTION CHAIN OF FAME & SOME FURY ' Fb "  ***" IT'S Kool Sharing Our Lives & Points Of View On LIVING 'Loving , Eating , Relaxing, Entertaining , Exercise, Mental Health, Community Awareness  , FAMILY VALUES OR THE LACK OF MORALES WITH IN US AS HUMANS ' WE LEARN ABOUT Support & POLITICAL DISADVANTAGES along WITH THE STRENGTH OF SHARED UNITY IN OUR FUTURE & FOR OUR CHILDREN & OUR WORLD ' WE ALL WANT THE BEST FOR US LIFE IN LIFE WITH ' PeACe , JOY, SECURITY LOVE & JUSTICE FOR EACH "amen ! THANKS FOR LEANING US THE PLATFORM TO COMMUNICATE AROUND THE WORLD PRETTY MUCH WE ARE SHARING OUR WEALTH OF CONCERN & PASSION" . 9/12/14
